intro: Randia deccanensis, commonly known as the Deccan randia, is a flowering plant native to the Indian subcontinent. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its slender, erect stem and opposite, ovate leaves with serrated edges. It produces small, white to pinkish flowers that are clustered in inflorescences. The fruit is a small, fleshy capsule that splits open to release tiny seeds.
